lender.loan_because: I want to help a woman make a difference.

lender.occupational_info:
I am a student in the US and feel the need to do some good in the world.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Help people aquire credit to improve their lives
lender.occupational_info: I make braces for children that have problems walking

lender.name: Rich & Debbie
lender.loan_because: My sister introduced my to KIVA.
lender.occupational_info: Business Consultants

lender.name: Tiffini
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world

lender.name: Terrance L
lender.loan_because: Life should be good for all
lender.occupational_info: manage people and product

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: My daughter gave me the opportunity as a gift.
lender.occupational_info: Journalist and part-time fishing guide

lender.name: Libby
lender.loan_because: Microcredit can not only empower individuals, but also generate social capital in communities.
lender.occupational_info: As a recent graduate of the College of Wooster, I now work at ACCION Texas-Louisiana and gather client stories to post on the Kiva website.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: microcredit improves communities

lender.name: bill
lender.loan_because: We have more than we need. Karma
lender.occupational_info: Husband flys for a commercial airline. Wife sells Real Estate. Kids go to school and work.

lender.name: Bob & Ani
lender.loan_because: We are grateful for what we have been given in our lives and want to help others achieve their goals and dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Bob photographs real estate, weddings and nature. Ani provides relaxing skin treatments to people.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I believe it is every woman's right to provide for herself and her family. I have been blessed with a good life and want to pass on these blessings to others. My beautiful and thoughtful daughters gave me a certificate to start lending as my Christmas present in 2008. I am an active community volunteer working with youth in my area.
lender.occupational_info: I work in computer technology, helping to design software that is easy to use and understand.

lender.name: Nina Bounou
lender.loan_because: I feel it's a better alternative to giving, because the people that get the money can invest to increase their business, and that way also give working opportunities to people in their area

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: I believe one of the best things you can do to help people is to give them work.
lender.occupational_info: I administer the international arm of a precision electronics company.

lender.name: Kris
lender.loan_because: I want to help others pursue their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at a high school.

lender.name: Lance
lender.loan_because: it's good

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I loan because I know it would help me if I were in their shoes. Give a little, take a little.
lender.occupational_info: I get a phone call and hang out with that person, it's a different friend every day. That's all.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help to get started.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that creates and manufactures ceramic medical implantable devices such as knee replacements.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.occupational_info: I maintain and develop software used in web applications.

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: i like to help people

lender.name: John & Tracey
lender.loan_because: we can
lender.occupational_info: English teachers

lender.name: Dean and Evelyn
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us with success in our farming and has also blessed us with our family. We want to share what God has given us by helping other farmers with their crops and families. We want others to know of God's goodness.
lender.occupational_info: We are old now and do not farm our land. It is farmed by a younger man who pays us for the use of the land. When we did farm, we raised corn, beans and wheat. We had dairy cows for many years, then we raised chickens. We have six grown children and many grandchildren and great grandchildren.

lender.name: angela
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I've received a lot in life and I want to share with others.
lender.occupational_info: My work gives us a better understanding of how forests and forest management slow climate change.

lender.name: r's family
lender.loan_because: I like to share with others

lender.name: Dean
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed with resources that allow me to help in a small way

lender.name: Franz
lender.loan_because: to help
lender.occupational_info: chief in a hostel for elderly people

lender.name: Andrea
lender.occupation: advocate for victims of domestic violence

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I'm honored to help out.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: My Mom gave me a Kiva gift certificate for Christmas; I think it's a fantastic way to bridge global gaps and make the world a brighter place.
lender.occupational_info: I'm still waiting for real work, but hopefully someday I'll be a published author.

lender.name: Joyce and Mike
lender.loan_because: We believe everyone should be able to make an honest living.

lender.name: timothy
lender.loan_because: We live in a great country of opportunity and need to share that with others. Its sad when people will pay more for their cell phone bill in a month than they will lend in a year.
lender.occupational_info: buy/ sell

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I have traveled the world and witnessed the hurdles that women around the world must face each day just to survive. My blessing is that I am capable of helping.
lender.occupational_info: I am able to see my contribution make an immediate difference in the lives of Third World women.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I'm a human that likes other humans

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I'm also an entrepreneur. I work as a graphic designer for real estate publications and start-up businesses.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: My daughter introduced me to the site as a Christmas gift. What a great idea! We can all help others a little at a time.
lender.occupational_info: My daughter and I sew eco friendly bags, reusable fabric wet jet and clorox ready mop replacement pads. We do this to reduce the trash in the world. Kristin sews the produce bags to help get herself to college. We also make envelopes from magazines proceeds will go to kiva to help others.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a chance.

lender.name: Collette
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in others lives.
lender.occupational_info: Though I am a student in college, I have two jobs, one at my church nursery, and one at a childcare in an athletic club. I absolutely love working with kids.

lender.name: Ricard
lender.loan_because: gracies amic invisible...

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I like to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Maintaining campus lighting systems at the University of California Santa Cruz.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: Micro loans are the real solution to helping each other. I feel good about making a contribution to someone else in need. Every bit helps.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to get, use, fix and understand electronic tools and technology that assists them in their work and their lives.

lender.name: LisaPal
lender.loan_because: I'm grateful for all the blessings in my life and this is a good way to be reminded that most of us have a lot we take for granted. Micro-loans are a great way to make a difference.

lender.name: Bob Lisa Phil Kate
lender.loan_because: we give as a family to support other working families.
lender.occupational_info: A family of non-profit professionals.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: this is important. Market integration is an unavoidable and difficult force to face for many people across the world. Kiva allows a connection between people who live across the world through loans that support livelihoods. I think this also promotes the interests of the community rather than supporting ulterior motives for businesses.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: The world would be a much nicer place if we all treated each other as we wish to be treated. I'm grateful to be able to spare some money to help people make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: My job was consolidated with another person doing the same job - he had more seniority than I. At age 62 I took my SS when my unemployment ran out - I know how hard it is to scrimp and make ends meet.

lender.name: Raul Sueiro
lender.loan_because: I was gifted by growing in a lovely family that gave me the education and values so I could develop professionally and personally. Millions of persons are not so lucky and I feel they deserve all our support.
lender.occupational_info: Executive working on the hospitality Industry

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.occupational_info: I am a student who is attempting to learn more about how people making meaning in their lives.

lender.name: Mary
lender.occupational_info: I am studying voice in college and want to be a performer.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: Capitalism needs a human face. Kiva.org puts this idea into practice.
lender.occupational_info: The world is ours. God is love. -Rev Run.

lender.name: Nicki
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who have good ideas, but need the monetary help to make their dreams come alive.
lender.occupational_info: I live in Cleveland, Ohio. I'm married with three cats, but no kids. I'm very close to my two sisters and nieces.

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: God has blessed our family - in turn, we will bless others.

lender.name: Hanna & Richard
lender.loan_because: want to help people

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I learned about Kiva through my daughter and through her gift to me I am lending it on to others.
lender.occupational_info: I was a Systems Analyst for a Public Utility, Electric, and designed and implemented computer systems

lender.name: Brayden
lender.loan_because: Luigi made me.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student, I don't have a job. But once in a while I do chores for money.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: It is important to help others who are working to achieve a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I manage several departments in a hospital.

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: I would like to help someone who is working hard!
lender.occupational_info: I teach children who are 4 years old.

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: It matters.
lender.occupational_info: Helping others make changes in their lives.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I want to help artist's make a living from their creative projects, their writing, drawing, painting, craft work, or whatever feeds their souls.
lender.occupational_info: Some art, some cooking, some free time, some planning, some of everything else.

lender.name: Brian, Brenda, Mike, Amy, Carllee & Nick
Cheryl and Robert
lender.loan_because: it is a means of extending Hope around the world. The Great Commission inspires us to express love through action to our neighbours around the globe.
lender.occupational_info: inter-government relations

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: I believe that gestures of kindness help define me as a human being. We are all in need of something, and this is an opportunity to give something back.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Wes
lender.loan_because: I want to join in the locally based enterprises which bring hope to communities
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired United Methodist clergyman and have been involved with peace with justice issues for the past 50 years

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: It give me a feeling of satisfaction to help.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy quilting, creating websites, and my retirement.

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: It's easy.
lender.occupational_info: Paid note-taking during the year, and full time work during the summer

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: My daughter got me started. Seems like the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I manage information technology services at a small community college in Northern Minnesota.

lender.name: Katie
lender.occupational_info: I am a student.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: everyone in the world who has a dream and is willing to work hard deserves the chance to help themselves.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I want to help people begin businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student. I love soccer!

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I admire people with the determination and ambition to start and maintain a business.
lender.occupational_info: I travel the world on a floating island.

lender.name: Owen
lender.occupational_info: Out exploring the world!

lender.name: Martin
lender.occupational_info: I plan and lead introductions of new computer systems as well as continuous development in existing computer systems.

lender.name: Brenna
lender.loan_because: I want the people to have a better life.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.occupational_info: I am a United States Marine who deploys worldwide in hopes to better the lives of families accross the world.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: everyone's doing it...

lender.name: Tucker
lender.whereabouts: End of the Leash City Park

lender.name: Cameron
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Allyson
lender.occupational_info: I translate for Spanish-speaking patients that need to go to the hospital and don't speak English. I make it possible for the doctors and patients to communicate.

lender.name: Kit
lender.loan_because: It seems like such a small thing to do that can make a big impact on someone else's life.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: To help
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs

lender.name: Leigh
lender.loan_because: It is such a direct way of helping others. And I can get my money back and re-loan it again. The same money can make a positive impact many times over.

lender.name: Dru
lender.loan_because: My auntie gave me a gift certificate and I'm a nice kid.

lender.name: lauryn
lender.loan_because: I think they need it ,and I love to help people

lender.name: kenny
lender.loan_because: A wonderful gift from a friend
lender.occupational_info: I make music from my hands

lender.name: Rick
lender.occupational_info: I manage and maintain computers and devices and other sorts of technology (including our network) for Pacific Gas & Electric, the Northern California Utility.

lender.loan_because: I'm nice

lender.name: Elliot
lender.loan_because: What goes around comes around -
lender.occupational_info: It is important to make good things happen -

lender.name: Anders Lundin
lender.loan_because: It's meaningful

lender.name: Gabe
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I believe that hard work should be rewarded.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Marti
lender.occupational_info: Minister of Service and Word Evangelical Lutheran Church of American Plan and help lead worship, direct choirs and minister to members

lender.name: Grace
lender.loan_because: i want to help the world :] Love is the answer. Love completes the circle. If the circle is not completed it makes a "U" and there are no U-turns om the road to life...
lender.occupational_info: spreading peace, religion, and love around the world

lender.name: Becca
lender.loan_because: I love the fact that across the world someone is prospering and providing for their family and I am glad to help them do so.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a high school student in the United States.

lender.name: Luke
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate enough to have people support me through my life. I chose to give to others as i have been given
lender.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur, with business experience in the fields of dance, teaching, photography, and graphic design.

lender.name: CC & Dorian
lender.loan_because: Opportunity should come for anyone who is working so hard for it.

lender.name: alan
lender.loan_because: it's fun!
lender.occupational_info: sign painter/ musician

lender.name: The Family Smiths
lender.loan_because: Because it's the least we can do... we set this Kiva site up as a substitute for giving presents for Christmas. Others can use the money and we're happy to just spend time together as a family during the holidays.
lender.occupational_info: We have a variety of jobs... parents, students, teachers, social workers, an electrician, a geologist and a university professor.

lender.name: DAVE
lender.loan_because: I AM IN THE AUTOMOTIVE BUSINESS AND THINK THIS BUSINESS HAS A VERY GOOD CHANCE TO MAKE IT
lender.occupational_info: I FIX AND SELL CARS

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: I am interested in helping these people in their new business endeavors and in life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired lawyer, and am now doing my own jewelry hobby. I make silver necklaces, bracelets, and rings, with stones and cabachons, sometimes.

lender.name: Mudan
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I believe work can help give a person a way to sustain their life and help their family. I was once a teacher and I loved to teach. If the money I loan helps someone learn a skill to help them build a better life I can still be teaching in a way.
lender.occupational_info: I am now a retired teacher, I taught students at a university and then went into training employees in manufacturing settings. I loved to see students and employees grow and develop . I now make jewelry and handbuild ceramic pots. When I can I teach others how to do jewelry and pots I give them a skill they can keep.

lender.name: Tyson and Milane
lender.loan_because: We can!
lender.occupational_info: Tyson uses computers to create images and text for printing. Milane is a Student at University studying to become a translator between French, English and German.

lender.name: chuck
lender.loan_because: I had not heard of KIVA before one of my daughters gave me a(n eye opening) gift certificate for Christmas. People helping people succeed, no matter who they are or where they live, is a universal moral. I am pleased to help in my small way, but I am so pleased that so many others are contributors in their own ways. Thank you KIVA for creating the mechanism and the structure for little people of modest means to help little people of modest needs.

lender.name: Lea
lender.loan_because: I thought it was cool after my grandma gave me a gift certificate.
lender.occupational_info: Im a 7th grade student.

lender.name: Cody
lender.loan_because: I like to help. ;)
lender.occupational_info: I study genetics and immunology, to help develop treatments for infectious disease.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: together we can make a difference.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: When I travel I see people who just need a little help to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I design electronic products like computers, cell phone and DVR's.

lender.name: Kendall
lender.loan_because: I want to work my hardest to make the world a better place. Also, I loan because I want to support entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student. I run a business selling school supplies and donate 100% of the profits to a charity that helps bring education and hope to children affected by armed conflict. Check it out at: http://www.helpeduc8.org

lender.name: Paul
lender.occupational_info: I build homes.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.occupational_info: Senior Lecturer in Financial Accounting at Notre Dame University Australia.
